markdownRemark.html:
This blog is created with an idea to store the experience somewhere and make notes. I already have something like TIL(Today I Learned) where I mostly put the code snippets, but this blog more about writing and putting thoughts about video technologies and news as an even single and small thing.

If I make a mistake, please provide feedback, I appreciate that. ðŸ™Œ
